        public byte identifier()

      • applyTo

        protected Closeable applyTo(AbstractChronicleMapBuilder builder,
                Replica map,
                Replica.EntryExternalizable entryExternalizable,
                ChronicleMap chronicleMap)
        Description copied from class: Replicator
        Applies the replicator to the map instance and returns a Closeable token to manage resources, associated with the replication.

        This method isn't intended to be called from the client code.

        Specified by:
        applyTo in class Replicator
        Parameters:
        builder - the builder from which the map was constructed. The replicator may obtain some map configurations, not accessible via the map instance.
        map - a replicated map instance. Provides basic tools for replication implementation.
        entryExternalizable - the callback for ser/deser implementation in the replicator
        chronicleMap - to wrap.
        Returns:
        a Closeable token to control replication resources. It should be closed on closing the replicated map.

      • close

           throws IOException
